text: Ini: "anda p ccada sennig akw tiyav"? Ini: "Oebbi d Anagi gari yidwen. Iweeea yi d Leqwoan agi, iwakken a kwen nabi$ yis, kunwi akked wid u$uo ibbwev. Day, kunwi, war ccekk, a pcehhdem ar, ar tama n Oebbi, llan ioebbiten nniven"? Ini: "ur cehhde$"! Ini: "Neppa d Oebbi, siwa Yiwen. Nek, rri$ akin ayen tepcarakem
